Package sm.ALM.graficos

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Attribute
    That class will manage the attribute of our shapes
    Canvas2DPanel
    That class will manage a canvas that has an image inside.
    ColorComboRenderer
    That class let us define the stlye of our color combo
    Curve2DFigure
    It will manage a curve figure in our system
    Ellipse2DFigure
    It will manage a ellipse figure in our system
    Figure
    It is the abstract class of our figure
    FigureManager
    That class will manage the current shape of our canvas
    FontClass
    That class will manage all the feature of a font
    Line2DFigure
    It will manage a line figure in our system
    Rectangle2DFigure
    It will manage a rectangle figure in our system
    Text2DFigure
    It will manage a text figure in our system
    TextDialog
    This class let write the text that will be put in a shape

    Enum of our type of geometry
